product_name: Horny Toad Swerve Shorts - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Made of fine organic cotton twill with a touch of stretch, the Horny Toad Swerve shorts have a distinct look that lets you stand apart from the crowd while enjoying summertime adventures. Organic cotton is blended with a touch of spandex to give the shorts a little stretch; fabric has a subtle checkered pattern. Slash hand pockets, a coin pocket and 2 rear welt pockets (1 with button closure) stow your daily essentials. Angled belt loops and notch details at the side hems give the Horny Toad Swerve shorts some extra style. Closeout.
short_description: Made of fine organic cotton twill with a touch of stretch, the Horny Toad Swerve shorts have a distinct look that lets you stand apart from the crowd while enjoying summertime adventures.
